name: Icicle Spear
summary: Deals damage; is a multi-turn attack. 33.3% it will hit twice, 33.3% it hits 3 times, and 16.7% chance it will hit four or five times.
viability: One of the better multi-hit moves out there, but it can only really be used with Cloyster with Skill Link. This ensures that it will hit 5 times, making it a whopping 125 base power.
